basics.name: Patrick Owen R. Roldan
basics.label: Computer Engineer
basics.summary: I am a graduate of Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering in Pamantasan ng Cabuyao (PNC). I love science and technology, nature, and videogames.

work.summary: Handled technical assistance and contributed on a web application for the office
highlights: Assisted in the development of an internship scheduling system for PESO, supporting logging and management of intern attendances.

Contributed to designing and implementing homepage UI, two-factor authentication, Password reset, and portal routing using HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, and MySQL, enhancing security and led to a successful software development.

Helped on setting up printers, monitors, and projectors, design job postings and job advertisements on Canva, event setup and providing frontline assistance enabling the office to provide quality service for citizens of Cabuyao.
